verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> in the days יְהוֹיָקִ֧ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הָלוֹךְ֮ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house הָרֵכָבִים֒ <S%H7397><s%> of the Rechabites וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <S%H1696><s%> and speak אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וַהֲבִֽאוֹתָם֙ <S%H935><s%> unto them and bring בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> into one הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <S%H3957><s%> of the chambers וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֥ <S%H8248><s%> to drink אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> and give them wine

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> Then I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַאֲזַנְיָ֤ה <S%H2970><s%> Jaazaniah בֶֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲבַצִּנְיָ֔ה <S%H2262><s%> of Habaziniah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and all his sons וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and the whole house הָרֵכָבִֽים׃ <S%H7397><s%> of the Rechabites

וָאָבִ֤א <S%H935><s%> And I brought אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into לִשְׁכַּ֗ת <S%H3957><s%> into the chamber בְּנֵ֛י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons חָנָ֥ן <S%H2605><s%> of Hanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִגְדַּלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3012><s%> of Igdaliah אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֵ֙צֶל֙ <S%H681><s%> which [was] by לִשְׁכַּ֣ת <S%H3957><s%> the chamber הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> of the princes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which מִמַּ֗עַל <S%H4605><s%> which [was] above לְלִשְׁכַּ֛ת <S%H3957><s%> the chamber מַעֲשֵׂיָ֥הוּ <S%H4641><s%> of Maaseiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שַׁלֻּ֖ם <S%H7967><s%> of Shallum שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> the keeper הַסַּֽף׃ <S%H5592><s%> of the door

וָאֶתֵּ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> And I set לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָרֵכָבִ֗ים <S%H7397><s%> of the Rechabites גְּבִעִ֛ים <S%H1375><s%> pots מְלֵאִ֥ים <S%H4392><s%> full יַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine וְכֹס֑וֹת <S%H3563><s%> and cups וָאֹמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and I said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to שְׁתוּ־ <S%H8354><s%> unto them Drink יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> ye wine

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> But they said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נִשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> We will drink יָּ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> no wine כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for יוֹנָדָ֨ב <S%H3122><s%> for Jonadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רֵכָ֜ב <S%H7394><s%> of Rechab אָבִ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our father צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> us saying לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׁתּוּ־ <S%H8354><s%> Ye shall drink יַ֛יִן <S%H3196><s%> no wine אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> [neither ye] nor your sons עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וּבַ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> house לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִבְנ֗וּ <S%H1129><s%> Neither shall ye build וְזֶ֤רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִזְרָ֙עוּ֙ <S%H2232><s%> nor sow וְכֶ֣רֶם <S%H3754><s%> vineyard לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִטָּ֔עוּ <S%H5193><s%> nor plant וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> own לָכֶ֑ם כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> in בָּאֳהָלִ֤ים <S%H168><s%> in tents תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> ye shall dwell כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3117><s%> nor have [any] but all your days לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּֽחְי֜וּ <S%H2421><s%> that ye may live יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> many עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> where גָּרִ֥ים <S%H1481><s%> where ye [be] strangers שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> We

וַנִּשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> Thus have we obeyed בְּק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוֹנָדָ֤ב <S%H3082><s%> of Jonadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רֵכָב֙ <S%H7394><s%> of Rechab אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our father לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he צִוָּ֑נוּ <S%H6680><s%> in all that he hath charged לְבִלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁתֽוֹת־ <S%H8354><s%> us to drink יַ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> no wine כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָמֵ֔ינוּ <S%H3117><s%> all our days אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we נָשֵׁ֔ינוּ <S%H802><s%> we our wives בָּנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> our sons וּבְנֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1323><s%> nor our daughters

וּלְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> nor בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> Nor to build בָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> houses לְשִׁבְתֵּ֑נוּ <S%H3427><s%> for us to dwell in וְכֶ֧רֶם <S%H3754><s%> neither have we vineyard וְשָׂדֶ֛ה <S%H7704><s%> nor field וָזֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> nor seed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> have לָּֽנוּ׃

וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> But we have dwelt in בָּֽאֳהָלִ֑ים <S%H168><s%> tents וַנִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> and have obeyed וַנַּ֔עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and done כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֖נוּ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יוֹנָדָ֥ב <S%H3122><s%> according to all that Jonadab אָבִֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> our father

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become בַּעֲל֨וֹת <S%H5927><s%> came up נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> But it came to pass when Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶל֮ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָאָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> into the land וַנֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> that we said בֹּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> Come וְנָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> and let us go יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> for fear חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> of the army הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> and for fear חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> of the army אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> so we dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> unto Jeremiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָלֹ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and tell לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּלְיֽוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תִקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> Will ye not receive מוּסָ֛ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דְּבָרַ֖י <S%H1697><s%> act נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

הוּקַ֡ם <S%H6965><s%> are performed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> The words יְהוֹנָדָ֣ב <S%H3082><s%> of Jonadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רֵ֠כָב <S%H7394><s%> of Rechab אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> that he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֜יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁתֽוֹת־ <S%H8354><s%> not to drink יַ֗יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁתוּ֙ <S%H8354><s%> they drink עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> none but obey אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִצְוַ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> commandment אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> their father's וְאָ֨נֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> notwithstanding I have spoken אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to you הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> unto you rising early וְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> and speaking וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> but ye hearkened אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> to

וָאֶשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> I have sent אֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> also unto you all my servants הַנְּבִאִ֣ים ׀ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֣ים <S%H7925><s%> rising up early וְשָׁלֹ֣חַ ׀ <S%H7971><s%> and sending לֵאמֹ֡ר <S%H559><s%> [them] saying שֻׁבוּ־ <S%H7725><s%> Return נָ֡א <S%H4994><s%> now אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> ye now every man מִדַּרְכּ֨וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרָעָ֜ה <S%H7451><s%> from his evil וְהֵיטִ֣יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> and amend מַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H4611><s%> your doings וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> go אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> not after אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <S%H312><s%> other לְעָבְדָ֔ם <S%H5647><s%> to serve וּשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> them and ye shall dwell in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לָכֶ֖ם וְלַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> to you and to your fathers וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not הִטִּיתֶם֙ <S%H5186><s%> but ye have not inclined אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנְכֶ֔ם <S%H241><s%> your ear וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> nor hearkened אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about
